title: Apparition

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose 2 players to Death Mark.
- During the day, choose to Claim. All players at the start of the night will be informed the Apparition is Claiming.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot act on the first night.
- At the end of the night you Claim, you attack all players with a Death Mark. This does not happen if you die.
- After killing a player, your visits become astral.
- You can only Claim three times. You may not claim the day after killing a player.
- If you are roleblocked, you clean and kill your roleblocker instead of your action.
Destiny: Kill all who oppose the Peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See every living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
